mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM Purchase
AND company_code = #{company_code}
AND purchase_code like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND purchase_manager like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND purchase_register_employee like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
LIMIT #{startList}, 15

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Purchase
AND company_code = #{company_code}
AND purchase_code like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND purchase_manager like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND purchase_register_employee like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT into Purchase ( company_code, account_code, purchase_state, purchase_manager, purchase_date, purchase_due_date, purchase_register_date, purchase_register_employee, purchase_update_date, purchase_update_employee, purchase_memo ) values ( #{company_code}, #{account_code}, #{purchase_state}, #{purchase_manager}, #{purchase_date}, #{purchase_due_date}, SYSDATE(), #{purchase_register_employee}, SYSDATE(), #{purchase_update_employee}, #{purchase_memo})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Purchase WHERE purchase_code = #{purchase_code}
mapper.update: UPDATE Purchase SET company_code = #{company_code}, account_code = #{account_code}, purchase_state = #{purchase_state}, purchase_manager = #{purchase_manager}, purchase_date = #{purchase_date}, purchase_due_date = #{purchase_due_date}, purchase_register_date = SYSDATE(), purchase_register_employee = #{purchase_register_employee}, purchase_update_date = SYSDATE(), purchase_update_employee = #{purchase_update_employee}, purchase_memo = #{purchase_memo} WHERE purchase_code = #{purchase_code}
